markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Basic Eldritch Archer Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=1961) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 172 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Eldritch Archer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=59)

**Prerequisites**
[Eldritch Archer Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1960)

</column>

---

You gain the [basic spellcasting benefits](/Rules.aspx?ID=170). Each time you gain a spell slot of a new level from this archetype, add a spell of the appropriate spell level to your repertoire, either a common spell of your chosen tradition or another spell of that tradition you have learned or discovered.

<title level="2">Basic Eldritch Archer Spellcasting leads to...</title>
[Expert Eldritch Archer Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=1965)
name: Basic Eldritch Archer Spellcasting
